tool_description: UCF Resource Endpoints for GRC Schema (https://docs.grcschema.org/)
name: grcSchema
title: grcSchema

api_list.name: Role POST
api_list.description: Create a Role in the federated database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://grcschema.p.rapidapi.com/Role"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "grcschema.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Character POST
api_list.description: Adds a Character to the schema.  Please note: characters should only be added once they are known to be supported.

print(response.json())
